chapter.title: Database Mechanism
chapter.para: OTRS comes with an database layer to support different databases.

sect1.title: How ist works
sect1.para: The database layer (Kernel::System::DB) has two input options: SQL and XML.

sect2.title: SQL
sect2.para: The SQL interace should be used for normal database actions (SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, ...). It can be used like a normal Perl DBI interface.

sect2.title: XML
sect2.para: The XML interace should be used for CREATE and DROP tables. This way you can write database independent applications because this syntax is different from database to database.

sect1.title: Database Driver
sect1.para: The database driver are located under $OTRS_HOME/Kernel/System/DB/*.pm.
